cast.overview: Gia Carangi meteorically rises to modeling fame in the late 1970s but becomes overconsumed by persistent loneliness and drug addiction.
cast.title: Gia

details.biography: Rick Batalla has been a series regular, and guest star on various sitcoms and dramas for CBS, NBC, ABC, FOX, FX and TBS.He was also a writer, and director for TBS's Dinner and A Movie. He is a founding member member of the LA based Troubadour Theater Company. He studied at The Second City and with the creator of the Groundlings.
details.name: Rick Batalla
